properties.areaDesc: Waupaca, WI; Shawano, WI; Outagamie, WI
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 7 at 10:13AM CST by NWS Green Bay WI
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in
Wisconsin...

Wolf River at New London affecting Winnebago, Outagamie and
Waupaca Counties.

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Wisconsin...

Wolf River near Shiocton affecting Shawano, Outagamie and Waupaca
Counties.

.Heavy rain will fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt
increasing. Flows in Rivers will increase quickly and reach critical
levels.

For the Lower Wolf River...including Shiocton, New London, Lake
Poygan...Minor flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Wolf River near Shiocton.
* Until further notice.
* At 9:00 AM CST Tuesday, January 7 the stage was 11.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to continue slowly falling and
fall below flood stage Thursday evening.
* Impact...At 11.5 feet, There is minor flooding at the city park
along with lowland and adjacent agricultural land.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive
cars through flooded areas.

Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 100 PM CST.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning remains in effect
